page.title: 13RECREATION AT SCHOOL
page.content:
There is plenty of space at the school. It has a large front playground, a playing field, a swimming pool and a school garden. {"My favourite sport",}survey results by Patrick Curran and Jason Davies. Running was the favourite with 22 votes,followed by football with 17 votes, swimming with 12 votes and netball with 6.Rounders had three votes,cricket had 1.
{"New play equipment"}by Ben Worden. In our school we have got a lot of play equipment. We've got monkey bars, a frame with hanging ropes, a tyre tower, a totem pole, a boat, stepping stones, table, seats and a sandpit.It is all made out of tanalised timber.My favourite two are the tyre tower and the totem pole.
